about_the_game:
Hi Chat! This game is still in progress! I'll keep building on it!
GAME MODES:

Single Player
This game mode is a "Souls-Like" adventure! Hack, slash, and dodge your way through enemies while collecting Subs!

Multiplayer

Find the Bernie: This is a multiplayer game where you race on foot against others to reach the level end! The level end is marked by a floating orb with a Bernie Sanders cardboard cut-out.

More Multiplayer Game Modes Coming Soon!


GAMEPLAY FEATURES:

SPRINTING AND ROLLING
You can Jump over objects and on platforms. Sprint and Roll/Air Dash to beat your competition and avoid AI Enemies!

COMBAT
While other PvP players can do a small amount of damage to you, most combat will be from enemy AI. The enemies can STUN-LOCK you and deal serious damage.
Players can pick up Swords and Shields.
Players can Quick Attack with left mouse/R1 and Heavy Attack with right mouse/R2
Block with "V"/"L1"
Target nearest enemy with "TAB"/"R3"
Rolling when you have enemy Targeted will dodge the enemy in the direction you are moving.


STAMINA:
Sprinting, Rolling, Blocking, and Attacking drain your Stamina Bar
If stamina is drained, player cannot perform actions listed.


CHICKEN TENDIES:
Press Interact at chicken tenders or chicken wraps to Restore Health
Restoring Health will also RESET ENEMIES that died. So be strategic and other players will have to deal with enemies you Revived!


COLLECT SUBS:
Defeated enemies will give the player "subs" in a sub counter in bottom right corner.
Subs will unlock more special abilities (coming soon)

This is a community game for fans of HasanAbi twitch streamer.
I welcome ideas in growing this game!

*this is a fan made game for the twitch streamer HasanAbi. Game will remain free forever. All content is stream safe and music is made by me and other Hasan fans

legal_notice:
ALL GAME CONTENT IS INTENDED TO BE "STREAM SAFE"
MUSIC IS MADE BY ME AND OTHER HASANABI FANS

This game is 100% free
Content of this game was inspired by HasanAbi Twitch channel
name: Dank Subs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 3.5GHz / AMD A10-7800 APU 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 Series or AMD Radeon Rx 200 Series (excluding integrated chipsets) with OpenGL 4.5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The combat is kind of like a Souls game and there is a multiplayer mode like Fall Guys.You must find the level end first and avoid getting stun-locked and damaged by enemies! Gaming is back in a big way!
